description: This package adds Android Design Support Library support for MugenMvvmToolkit.
releaseNotes:
- Added the IMvvmApplication interface that allows to separate the logic associated with the launch of the application in a portable class library.
      - Added the ability to use command bindings with the OneTimeMode (Binding).
      - Added the DataContextResourceName property that allows to set default keywoard for the $context resource (Binding).
      - Added the ability to use empty binding parameters it would be equivalent to the $context binding: CommandParameter=; equivalent to CommandParameter=$context; (Binding).
      - Added the Application.IActivityLifecycleCallbacks listener to handle activity navigation not from the framework (Android).
      - Added binding support for preferences (Android).
      - Improved binding performance and reduced memory usage.
      - Optimized the xaml and target resources (Binding).
      - Fixed an incorrect behavior of the root listener in some case (Binding).
      - Fixed incorrect data context for the GetDropDownView method (Android).
      - Fixed incorrect data context in the case of explicit data context binding (Android ActionBarTab).
      - Handled the ObjectDisposedException that can be caused by race condition (Net 4.0 DelayBindingBehavior).
      - Removed IBindingSource and IBindingTarget interfaces and implementations (Binding).
      - Minor changes.
title: MugenMvvmToolkit - Android Design Support Library
